body.p: The Wine development release 1.3.2 is now available.

What's new in this release:
Update of the Gecko engine, now including a 64-bit version.
New implementation of console support on Unix terminals.
Many new functions in the C runtime dlls.
Various bug fixes.

p.p: The source is available now. Binary packages are in the process of being built, and will appear soon at their respective download locations.
